column4: Can you please ellaborate on update-alternatives? Does it mean that the packaging system knows that python2.7 is the default python and not python3.2?
update-alternatives should be able to switch between different version, most frequently used to switch between versions of java. If memory serves me well, it also works for python.
Ok. My suspicition is that update-alternatives might depend on package dependencies system so I'll advise dtcummin to run it after the symlink change.
Update-alternatives changes the symlinks to for example python and java, saving you from having to do that by hand.
